review: I had been streaming Netflix to my 2 TVs (neither of which had the app built in) with a Playstation 3, which meant I had to move the PS3 between the TVs. For the low price of a Chromecast, it was more than worth it to not have to move the PS3 anymore. Plus I love being able to cast YouTube videos or web content from my phone or computer to the TV, which I've done a fair amount of. Very cool.I've been using it for 2 months and haven't had any issues. There is a bit of a lag between the time you click the cast button for it to show up on your TV, but it's not bad. I haven't had any buffering slowness. Love it!
